name: Great Race
description:
NOTE:

Right now the web build multiplayer is not working because it cannot connect to a non https url.  I am working to fix this and enabled a version of local play for the web build.  Also my textmeshs are not showing up for some reason in the web build, but without multiplayer they are not really needed.

You can download the windows build (GreatRace.zip) if you want to play online.

Race to get to the egg first.

10 players online race against the clock.

What are the odds you will win.

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

IN GAME CONTROLS:

W = ADD FORCE FORWARD

S = ADD FORCE BACKWARDS

A = ADD ROTATIONAL FORCE LEFT

D = ADD ROTATIONAL FORCE RIGHT

WAITING CAMERA CONTROLS:

W = UP  S = DOWN

A = LEFT  D = RIGHT

Q = ZOOM IN 

E = ZOOM OUT
